newsitem.title: USA: Tejas Gas Texas natgas line shut by fire.
newsitem.headline: Tejas Gas Texas natgas line shut by fire.

text.p: Tejas Gas Corp shut a 16-inch natural gas pipeline on Monday after a fire broke out in four condensate tanks along the line in Devers, Texas about 50 miles east of Houston, a company spokesman said.
The lateral Smith Point pipeline was being cleaned and there was no natural gas flowing on the gathering line when the fire was ignited, Tejas spokesman Tom Whittinghill said.
"We had the line blown down. We were involved in a cleaning operation, pigging the line," he said.
One worker was injured in the blaze, which was contained to the condensate tanks in the remote area.
